segments.text: This scene just breaks my heart a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's so absorbed in her routine, drying that plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea the sink's flooding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's cascading over the edge, pooling around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to ruin the floor and cabinets if it keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is risking a bad fall for some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable, legs all spread out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching in the jar, probably excited about his find.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, hoping for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids being kids, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden view contrasts with this indoor chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
